H0.text: Play games is the most useful thing the computer does for students in classrooms that have computers, because it helps them.

H1.text: Watch movies is the most useful activity for students in classrooms that have computers, because the computer helps them watch movies.

H2.text: Listening to music is the most useful way that a computer helps students in some classrooms.

H3.text: Finding information is why the computer is most useful to students in classrooms that have computers.

A4.text: Games also usually come with a sense of progression, which can help keep students motivated and consistent while trying to improve.

A5.text: Computers, tablets, and mobile devices enable learners and educators to access websites as well as applications.
